title: Pinpoint
description: The Pinpoint website is a web-based process book created for my Design Thinking class. It goes through the steps my team and I took in order to design a solution to a problem that falls under the theme,  Surviving College.

title: Spofity
description: Spofity was an assignment where I used the Spotify API in combination with AngularJS.  There's an artist search that can be filtered to show specific songs or albums.  Users can listen to previews of the track, which leads to a simultaneous display of recent Instagram photos (using the Instagram API) tagged with #trackname.
tags: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap 3, AngularJS, Spotify API, Instagram API

title: Police Shootings
description: Police Shootings is an interactive map of crowdsourced police shooting data. Plotted points on the map indicate where police shootings occurred.  Points can be clicked for more information, and layers can be changed to show various shootings for males, females, and unknown/unspecified gender.
tags: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap 3, jQueryAJAX, Leaflet.js

title: Reviews
description: Created in order to practice making a CRUD web application, Reviews" is a basic, and slightly silly user-reviews system. It utilizes Parse.com - the cloud-based database to store user input. It dynamically displays reviews in the feed. Reviews can be up/downvoted or deleted - although currently any user can delete any comment."
tags: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap 3, jQuery/AJAX, Parse.com
